original_text: And it came to pass after many days, that the Lord said unto me, Arise, go to Euphrates, and take the girdle from thence, which I commanded thee to hide there.
korean_text: 여러 날 후에 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 일어나 유브라데로 가서 내가 네게 명령하여 거기 감추게 한 띠를 가져오라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass after many days,
that the Lord said unto me,
and take the girdle from thence,
which I commanded thee to hide there.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 거기에 숨기라고 명령했던 것을.
